CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 26, 1955 reads: "GFS Board Meets In Pittsburgh - When the Girl Friends' national executive board met in Pittsburgh last week-end, the above charmers attended. Seated: Alberta Williams, Pittsburgh; Vay Fortune, Washington, D.C.; Anita Wheatley, Baltimore, Md.; Dorothy Sales, Washington, and Connie Hayes, Detroit.  Standing: Marybelle Primus, Pittsburgh ;Laura Holland, Buffalo, N.Y.; Eileen Sawyer, Pittsburgh ;Connye Cottrell, New York; Catherine Smith, Philadelphia; Natalie Holmes, Roanoke, Va.; Rebecca Ward, Newport News, Va.; Peggy Kennell, Albany, N.Y.; Billie Byrd Brown, Pittsburgh, national president; Carlyn Stewart, Washington, and Marjorie Harris, Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Girl Friends Inc. members, seated from left: Alberta Williams, Vay Fortune, Anita Wheatley, Dorothy Sales, and Connie Hayes; standing from left: Marybelle Primus, Laura Holland, Aileen Eckstein Sawyer, Connye Cottrell, Catherine Smith, Natalie Holmes, Rebecca Ward, Peggy Kennell, Billie Byrd Brown, Carlyn Stewart, and Marjorie Harris, gathered around table for national executive board meeting in interior with wooden paneling
